command.description: Execute the query of the active editor.
command.name: Execute query

action.label: Add file(s)
action.tooltip: Add one or more files (EAR, JAR, WAR etc.).

action.label: Add files of one folder
action.tooltip: Add the files (EAR, JAR, WAR, etc.) of one folder. Do NOT recurse into subdirectories.

action.label: Add files of one folder and recursive sub-folders
action.tooltip: Add the files (EAR, JAR, WAR, etc.) of one folder and all its subdirectories (recursively).

category.description: Properties specified by the JDO standard.
category.name: JDO standard

property.description: The name of the PMF implementation. Only required if you have more than one JDO implementation in the CLASSPATH.

category.description: Properties specified by the JPA standard.
category.name: JPA standard

property.description: Class name of the provider to use.

category.description: Properties available in DataNucleus 3.0 - most of them work in older versions, too, but you should check the DataNucleus documentation to be sure.
category.name: DataNucleus 3.0

category.description: Properties available in OpenJPA 2.2.1 - most of them work in older versions, too, but you should check the OpenJPA documentation to be sure.
category.name: OpenJPA 2.2.1
